title: Julien Delmas
text:
Hi,
My name is Julien Delmas.
I am working as Technical Service Chemist in the lithium ion battery. I started to learn R on my own few years ago. I am interested in data visualisation, work automation, data science, statistics…
This is my personal blog. I will post about various subject and practice R.

title: Julien Delmas
text:
Hi,
My name is Julien Delmas.
I am working as Technical Service Chemist in the lithium ion battery. I started to learn R on my own few years ago. I am interested in data visualization, work automation, data science, statistics…
This is my personal blog. I will post about various subject and practice R.

title: JDelmas974
text:
Equivalent to a Master’s degree
Engineering courses focused on chemistry
One year exchange in Japan





Tools - Microsoft Office, R, basic skills: SQL, Git, SAP
Technical skills - Polymer, Lithium Ion Battery Process: slurry preparation, coating, cell and electrochemical evaluation
Languages - French: Native, English: business (TOEIC, 02/2008, 900/990), Japanese: business (JLPT N2, 12/2013, 91/180), German: beginner (ZDfB, 06/2007, 60/100)



Technical: product presentation and recommendation (anode, cathode, separator), product qualification (PPAP…)
Sales: production planning, logistic, outreach to customer,

Sustainability: LCA study coordinator
Legal: NDA, contract…
Project: coordinator and main contact person for local production in Europe



Research mission for the development of binder for the cathode and anode of lithium ion battery
Coordination and commercialization of aqueous products (binder) for the positive electrode
Market: automotive market, energy storage system (ESS)
Technical advice for European customers from the binder utilization (slurry preparation process), electrode formulation to the electrochemical evaluation of the products.
Technical seminar at customers laboratory to demonstrate products utilization
Products promotion at international exhibition (Stuttgart, 2016)



Technical and development support for Asia-Pacific customer, engineering plastics and processing; long chain polyamide, polyphtalamide, elastomers
Market: Automotive, Industrial, Consumer, E&E market with prevalence experience in the automotive sector



Formulation of water-borne emulsion, Kynar® Aquatec for coating applications



Functionalization of indole derivate with click chemistry reaction



Synthesis and evaluation of the cooling effect of a menthol derivate



Driving licence
Sport (Tennis), cinema, reading

title: First blog post
text:
This is my first post. It will be short and just how I created my CV for this website. Thank you for all the people who put out resources for me to create my first blog and CV:

Model of the website and CV
Publication of the blog through Github and deployment with Netlify
